title: test_reckless (on maint) with git-annex-8.20201007

labels.name: severity-important
labels.description: major effect on the usability of a package, without rendering it completely unusable to everyone

body:
In a test build against most recent git-annex on conda-forge (one of those runs stalled in previous run before tune up of .ssh/config permissions which were r for everyone)
https://travis-ci.com/github/datalad/datalad/jobs/454325181
https://travis-ci.com/github/datalad/datalad/jobs/454325180

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_clone.test_reckless(True,)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 750, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 750, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 750, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/core/distributed/tests/test_clone.py", line 367, in check_reckless
    & stat.S_IWGRP)
AssertionError: 16 is not false
```

this seems to be the only one failing ATM.
While submitting a fix, please include https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/5203/commits/255709b55f93430d64fe10822c589295d63bc34f in some form
